I01.name: Bracelet of Lesser Pain
I01.description: Gives a lesser resistance towards incoming damage.

I02.name: Bracelet of Reduced Pain
I02.description: Makes you more resistant towards incoming damage.

I03.name: Bracelet of No Pain
I03.description: Greatly increases resistance towards incoming damage.

I04.name: Necklace of Lesser Life
I04.description: Gives a lesser boost to your health.

I07.name: Ring of Lesser Power
I07.description: Gives a lesser boost to your attacks.

I10.name: Jagged Sword
I10.description: A mighty sword from legends. A mage cannot wield it.

I11.name: Stormcaller
I11.description: A magnificent staff of archmages. A warrior cannot use it.

I12.name: Steelbreaker
I12.description: A formidable shield of protectors. A rogue cannot wield it.
